Text: Transaction informationa copy of the deal information I left a message with Bob Bowen as the deal he added appears to be an Enron Canada deal The Enron confirmation that was executed stated the counterparty as Enron Canada Our lawyer is looking at the Assignment agrement transactdoc Kathy Bolan Contracts Manager PGE Energy Trading Canada Corporation Phone Fax Email PGE Energy Trading and any other company referenced herein which uses the PGE name or logo are not the same company as Pacific Gas and Electric Company the California utility These companies are not regulated by the California Public Utilities Commission and customers do not have to buy products from these companies in order to continue to receive quality regulated services from the utility transactdoc
